title: A. Count Vowels
description: Berilgan stringdagi unli harflar sonini hisoblang (a, e, i, o, u).
descriptionHtml:
Berilgan s stringdagi unli harflar sonini qaytaring. Unli harflar: a, e, i, o, u (katta va kichik harflar).

Misol:

Input: s = "hello world"
Output: 3
Tushuntirish: e, o, o - jami 3 ta unli harf

examples.explanation: e, o, o - jami 3 ta unli harf

hints: Katta va kichik harflarni hisobga oling
